languages.text: "Я... верно вас услышал? Вы хотите порвать наши отношения?"
"Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"
languages.original_text: "Я... верно вас услышал? Вы хотите порвать наши отношения?"

traits.locale_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"
"Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"
"Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"
"Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"
"Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"
"Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"

languages.text: 「今のは…聞き間違いですか？全て終わりにしたいのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"

traits.locale_text: 「今のは…聞き間違いですか？全て終わりにしたいのですか？」

languages.text: "Habe ich ... das richtig verstanden? Ihr wollt, dass alles vorbei ist?"
languages.original_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"

traits.locale_text: "Habe ich ... das richtig verstanden? Ihr wollt, dass alles vorbei ist?"

languages.text: « Ai-je... bien entendu ? Vous voulez mettre fin à notre relation ? »
languages.original_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"

traits.locale_text: « Ai-je... bien entendu ? Vous voulez mettre fin à notre relation ? »

languages.text: «¿Le... le he oído bien? ¿Quiere que lo dejemos todo?».
languages.original_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Le... le he oído bien? ¿Quiere que lo dejemos todo?».

languages.text: “我……没听错吧？你是希望这一切都结束吗？”
languages.original_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"

traits.locale_text: “我……没听错吧？你是希望这一切都结束吗？”

languages.text: "Doğru mu... Duydum? Her şeyin bitmesini mi istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"

traits.locale_text: "Doğru mu... Duydum? Her şeyin bitmesini mi istiyorsun?"

languages.original_text: "Did I... hear you correctly? You want everything to end?"
